post.text: Together, we will bring the REAL CHANGE we've been waiting for!

comment.author: Taylor
comment.text: PAY US BACK OBAMA.... Obama needs to reimburse our tax money for his salary and using Air Force One to campaign for Hillary.... There are a lot of us that DO NOT want to see Hillary and her evil ways back into the Whitehouse.. Pay us back Obama.! ... You aren't working for all Americans when you are campaigning for Hillary trying to push her down our throats. ... I think we Americans don't need you to tell us anymore what we believe in and want.. . PAY US BACK OBAMA!!
